00027   template<class T>
00028   class Matrix {
00029 
00030         typedef CountableArray<T> ArrayType;
00031 
00032   public:
00033 
00035         typedef T value_type;
00036 
00038         typedef value_type& reference;
00039 
00041         typedef const value_type& const_reference;
00042 
00044         typedef std::size_t size_type;
00045 
00047         typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00048 
00050         Matrix () : base(), m(0), n(0), stride(0), data(0)
00051         {}
00052 
00054         Matrix (size_type _m, size_type _n) 
00055           : base(new ArrayType(_m*_n)), m(_m), n(_n), stride(_n)
00056         {
00057           data = &((*base)[0]);
00058         }
00059 
00061         Matrix (size_type _m, size_type _n, const T& _t) 
00062           : base(new ArrayType(_m*_n,_t)), m(_m), n(_n), stride(_n)
00063         {
00064           data = &((*base)[0]);
00065         }
00066 
00068         Matrix (const Matrix& A) 
00069       : base(A.base), m(A.m), n(A.n), stride(A.stride), data(A.data)
00070     {}
00071 
00073         Matrix& operator= (const Matrix& A)
00074     {
00075       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00076         for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00077           (*this)[i][j] = A[i][j];
00078       return *this;
00079     }
00080 
00082         Matrix& operator= (const T& t)
00083     {
00084       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00085         for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00086           (*this)[i][j] = t;
00087       return *this;
00088     }
00089 
00091     Matrix<T> sub (size_type i, size_type j, size_type rows, size_type cols)
00092     {
00093       Matrix<T> A;
00094       A.base = base;
00095       A.stride = stride;
00096       A.m = rows;
00097       A.n = cols;
00098       A.data = data+i*stride+j;
00099       return A;
00100     }
00101 
00103         T* operator[] (size_type i)
00104         {
00105           return data+i*stride;
00106         }
00107 
00109         const T* operator[] (size_type i) const
00110         {
00111           return data+i*stride;
00112         }
00113 
00121     Matrix& operator+= (const Matrix& B)
00122     {
00123       for (size_type i=0; i<m; ++i) 
00124         for (size_type j=0; j<n; ++j) 
00125         (*this)[i][j] += B[i][j];
00126       return *this;
00127     }
00128 
00136     Matrix& operator-= (const Matrix& B)
00137     {
00138       for (size_type i=0; i<m; ++i) 
00139         for (size_type j=0; j<n; ++j) 
00140         (*this)[i][j] -= B[i][j];
00141       return *this;
00142     }

00151 
00152     Matrix& operator*= (const T& s)
00153     {
00154       for (size_type i=0; i<m; ++i) 
00155         for (size_type j=0; j<n; ++j) 
00156           (*this)[i][j] *= s;
00157       return *this;
00158     }

00167 
00168     Matrix& operator/= (const T& s)
00169     {
00170       for (size_type i=0; i<m; ++i) 
00171         for (size_type j=0; j<n; ++j) 
00172           (*this)[i][j] /= s;
00173       return *this;
00174     }
00175 
00184    void update (const T& s, const Matrix& B)
00185     {
00186       for (size_type i=0; i<m; ++i) 
00187         for (size_type j=0; j<n; ++j) 
00188           (*this)[i][j] += s*B[i][j];
00189     }

00193     template<class V>
00194     void mv (Vector<V>& y, const Vector<V>& x) const
00195     {
00196       if (this->rowsize()!=y.size()) 
00197         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and y do not match");
00198       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00199         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and x do not match");
00200       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00201         {
00202           y[i] = 0;
00203           for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00204             y[i] += (*this)[i][j]*x[j];
00205         }
00206     }
00207

00210     void umv (Vector<V>& y, const Vector<V>& x) const
00211     {
00212       if (this->rowsize()!=y.size()) 
00213         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and y do not match");
00214       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00215         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and x do not match");
00216       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00217         {
00218           for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00219             y[i] += (*this)[i][j]*x[j];
00220         }
00221     }

00224     template<class V>
00225     void umv (Vector<V>& y, const V& s, const Vector<V>& x) const
00226     {
00227       if (this->rowsize()!=y.size()) 
00228         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and y do not match");
00229       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00230         HDNUM_ERROR("mv: size of A and x do not match");
00231       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00232         {
00233           for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00234             y[i] += s*(*this)[i][j]*x[j];
00235         }
00236     }

00239     void mm (const Matrix<T>& A, const Matrix<T>& B)
00240     {
00241       if (this->rowsize()!=A.rowsize()) 
00242         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00243       if (this->colsize()!=B.colsize()) 
00244         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00245       if (A.colsize()!=B.rowsize()) 
00246         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00247 
00248       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00249         for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00250           {
00251             (*this)[i][j] = 0;
00252             for (size_type k=0; k<A.colsize(); k++)
00253               (*this)[i][j] += A[i][k]*B[k][j];
00254           }
00255     }
00256     
00258     void umm (const Matrix<T>& A, const Matrix<T>& B)
00259     {
00260       if (this->rowsize()!=A.rowsize()) 
00261         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00262       if (this->colsize()!=B.colsize()) 
00263         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00264       if (A.colsize()!=B.rowsize()) 
00265         HDNUM_ERROR("mm: size incompatible");
00266 
00267       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00268         for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00269           for (size_type k=0; k<A.colsize(); k++)
00270             (*this)[i][j] += A[i][k]*B[k][j];
00271     }
00272     
00274     void sc (const Vector<T>& x, size_type k)
00275     {
00276       if (this->rowsize()!=x.size()) 
00277         HDNUM_ERROR("cc: size incompatible");
00278 
00279       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00280         (*this)[i][k] = x[i];
00281     }
00282 
00284     void sr (const Vector<T>& x, size_type k)
00285     {
00286       if (this->colsize()!=x.size()) 
00287         HDNUM_ERROR("cc: size incompatible");
00288 
00289       for (size_type i=0; i<colsize(); i++)
00290         (*this)[k][i] = x[i];
00291     }
00292 
00294     T norm_infty () const
00295     {
00296       T norm(0.0);
00297       for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00298         {
00299           T sum(0.0);
00300           for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00301             sum += myabs((*this)[i][j]);
00302           if (sum>norm) norm = sum;
00303         }
00304       return norm;
00305     }
00306 
00308     T norm_1 () const
00309     {
00310       T norm(0.0);
00311       for (size_type j=0; j<colsize(); j++)
00312         {
00313           T sum(0.0);
00314           for (size_type i=0; i<rowsize(); i++)
00315             sum += myabs((*this)[i][j]);
00316           if (sum>norm) norm = sum;
00317         }
00318       return norm;
00319     }

00369   private:
00370     T myabs (T x) const
00371     {
00372       if (x>=T(0)) return x; else return -x; 
00373     }

00375         CP<ArrayType> base; // array referenced by this vector
00376         size_type m,n;      // dimensions of the matrix (m x n : m rows, n columns)
00377         size_type stride;   // original length of a row
00378         T* data;            // pointer to first element used in base

00382   template<class T>
00383   int Matrix<T>::iwidth_ = 3;
00384   template<class T>
00385   int Matrix<T>::width_ = 10;
00386   template<class T>
00387   int Matrix<T>::precision_ = 2;

00390   template <class T>
00391   inline std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& s, const Matrix<T>& A)
00392   {
00393         s << " " << std::setw(A.iwidth()) << " " << "  ";
00394         for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00395           s << std::setw(A.width()) << j << " ";
00396         s << std::endl;
00397         for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00398           {
00399                 s << " " << std::setw(A.iwidth()) << i << "  ";
00400                 for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00401                   s << std::setw(A.width()) << std::scientific << std::showpoint 
00402                         << std::setprecision(A.precision()) << A[i][j] << " "; 
00403                 s << std::endl;
00404           }
00405     return s;
00406   }

00409   template<class T>
00410   inline void fill (Matrix<T> A, const T& t)
00411   {
00412     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00413           for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00414         A[i][j] = t;
00415   }

00418   template<class T>
00419   inline void zero (Matrix<T> A)
00420   {
00421     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00422           for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00423         A[i][j] = T(0);
00424   }
00425 
00427   template<class T>
00428   inline void identity (Matrix<T> A)
00429   {
00430     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00431           for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00432                 if (i==j)
00433                   A[i][i] = T(1);
00434                 else
00435                   A[i][j] = T(0);
00436   }
00437 
00439   template<class T>
00440   inline void spd (Matrix<T> A)
00441   {
00442         if (A.rowsize()!=A.colsize() || A.rowsize()==0) 
00443           HDNUM_ERROR("need square and nonempty matrix");
00444     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00445           for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00446                 if (i==j)
00447                   A[i][i] = T(4.0);
00448                 else
00449                   A[i][j] = - T(1.0)/((i-j)*(i-j));
00450   }
00451 
00453   template<class T>
00454   inline void vandermonde (Matrix<T> A, const Vector<T> x)
00455   {
00456         if (A.rowsize()!=A.colsize() || A.rowsize()==0) 
00457           HDNUM_ERROR("need square and nonempty matrix");
00458         if (A.rowsize()!=x.size()) 
00459           HDNUM_ERROR("need A and x of same size");
00460     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00461       {
00462         T p(1.0);
00463         for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00464           {
00465             A[i][j] = p;
00466             p *= x[i];
00467           }
00468       }
00469   }

00472   template<class T>
00473   inline Matrix<T> copy (const Matrix<T> A)
00474   {
00475     Matrix<T> B(A.rowsize(),A.colsize());
00476     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00477           for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00478         B[i][j] = A[i][j];
00479     return B;
00480   }

00483   template<class T>
00484   inline void gnuplot (const std::string& fname, const Matrix<T> A)
00485   {
00486     std::fstream f(fname.c_str(),std::ios::out); 
00487     for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type i=0; i<A.rowsize(); ++i)
00488       {
00489         for (typename Matrix<T>::size_type j=0; j<A.colsize(); ++j)
00490           f << std::setw(A.width()) << std::scientific << std::showpoint 
00491             << std::setprecision(A.precision()) << A[i][j] << std::endl;
00492         f << std::endl;
00493       }
00494     f.close();
00495   }
